* She'd already set up 3 autoguns by now, thinking how she could go inside 
and gather more if needed.
Iron sat back on her heels and sighed, dusting herself off and stepping away 
from the last one.
Each had a portable shield infront of it, but the charges were set to a 
signature that could go through the shield and towards an approaching enemy.
The CF was under heavy attack, and she was going to skin the first 
Decepticon she came across. Screw the future, she wanted spark plugs!
Iron Raptor looked over her shoulder at the battle, spying Imprisoner firing 
at the shit.
From her wrist a phaser emerged and locked into place with the grip in her 
hand, arm outstretched and auto-targeting the bot's chest plate.
She fired 4 splatter charges, ones that would explode on impact and could 
rip a bot to pieces.*

" Leave my ship alone!"

* With the autoguns programmed to fire on a mere thought, they swivled on 
their bases, targeting along with her own system and zoning in on 
Imprisoner, fireing off a blast each before turning in unison towards 
Predator and firing towards him.*
